::KitKat::

She heard him say she had helped them.  But she refused to believe 
it. She did waht she felt was right.  She knew they would have 
tortured her in any number of way that she didn't want to try to 
imagine.  She covered her face with her hands and cried.  She had 
never thought of the pain that doing the right thing would cause 
her.  Her friend was dead and Land Mine's pain was over.  Her's had 
just begun.  She felt her spark fall to her feet.  She cried and ept 
for her friend.  She knew she saved her friend uncounted hours of 
angony and pain from the maximals, but her pain was just beginning.
